name: [AR] Basketball
description:
Playing a basketball requires at least one ball and if you want to go further you need a hoop. And how about a nice basketball court? With "[AR] Basketball" you have it all in your pocket. Play whenever you want. Show your skills! To make sure you do not get bored, we did not make it too easy for you to throw baskets.

With «[AR] Basketball», you get the first augmented reality basketball app, that really gives you a feeling of playing around with a basketball, combined with a completely new gaming experience. Play basketball with proper 3D movements.

Use your device to dribble and throw. With one button you can easily bring yourself into an entire basketball court in real size.

Use the settings menu. Here you find useful configuration options such as the sensitivity of the ball, its distance relative to yourself, the re-action force, when dribbling, general gravity or the direction of light. All graphic 3D elements are of the highest quality.

As always, this game will be without in-app purchases or annoying ads to help you get a nice product.

We wish you a lot of fun with this AR title.
